channel.title: Bugada & Cargnel on Artangled

item.title: Interlude - Théo Mercier at Bugada & Cargnel
item.description: Back in lockdown, nowhere to go. Which is a problem for a website that’s updated weekly, with updates based on an exhibition I saw that week. During the spring 2020 lockdown here in London, I wrote a bunch of posts about works in permanent collections that I was thinking of at time of writing. This time, during this hopefully short winter interlude of closed galleries, I’m going to dig into my notes, and write each week about a standout show I saw sometime in the past, that didn’t make the website for whatever reason.
